outboundReferences.contextLine: Related to [[data-augmentation]] and [[training-notes]], we also want to ensure that the dataset used for training and testing is balanced. Random splits on real life imbalanced data is probably not going to do well, as we will end up with models biased against rare events.

Related to [[data-augmentation]] and [[training-notes]], we also want to ensure that the dataset used for training and testing is balanced. Random splits on real life imbalanced data is probably not going to do well, as we will end up with models biased against rare events.
